job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer to play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps serving over 4m+ users across the globe., As a member of our tech team in Amsterdam, and together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services. Additionally, you will have the responsibility of designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
     * Write production-grade product and platform code.
     * Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
     * Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   Projects you can look forward to:
     * CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
     * Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
     * Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Go Engineer

We are looking for an ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer to play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps serving over 4m+ users across the globe., As a member of our tech team in Amsterdam, and together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services. Additionally, you will have the responsibility of designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
     * Write production-grade product and platform code.
     * Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
     * Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   Projects you can look forward to:
     * CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
     * Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
     * Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Go programming and traditional software engineering tasks, with AI mentioned primarily as a platform the software interacts with, rather than the core focus of development. The role emphasizes building scalable, reliable, and secure software products and apps, including mobile apps and community tools like an AI chatbot. While Generative AI is mentioned in the context of a tool (CF Spark) and an AI Chatbot, the core responsibilities and technologies listed point towards a traditional software engineering role rather than a specialized GenAI or ML Engineer role.

job_tasks.justification: The job description emphasizes writing 'production-grade product and platform code', 'component technical designs', and delivering 'quality code', which are core software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Write production-grade product and platform code

job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing and implementing systems that interact with an AI-powered platform, requiring traditional software engineering skills to ensure scalability, reliability, and security.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform

job_tasks.justification: The mention of launching Mobile Apps for iOS and Android directly relates to building user-facing software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms

job_tasks.justification: Developing Community Tools, specifically an AI Chatbot, involves building software applications that incorporate AI functionalities.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions catering to the requirements of an 'expanding user community' and empowering users to 'maximize the benefits derived from our products and services', indicating a need to understand user needs and business goals.
job_tasks.phrase: cater to the requirements of our expanding user community

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'make data-driven decisions' suggests an understanding of how data informs business strategy and product development.
The emphasis on 'scalable, reliable, and secure' delivery of software systems, especially those interacting with an AI platform, touches upon operational concerns for production systems.
job_tasks.phrase: ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure

soft_skills.phrase: together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers
Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture
play a key role in the development and delivery
Take responsibility for component technical designs
Take responsibility for component technical designs
